solution_line_template: Janessa starts with {janessa_own_cards} cards + {father_cards} cards = <<{janessa_own_cards}+{father_cards}={initial_cards}>>{initial_cards} cards.
She adds {initial_cards} cards + {ebay_cards} cards = <<{initial_cards}+{ebay_cards}={total_cards}>>{total_cards} cards from the eBay purchase.
Janessa decides to throw away {total_cards} cards - {bad_shape_cards} cards = <<{total_cards}-{bad_shape_cards}={good_cards}>>{good_cards} cards due to damage.
After giving Dexter the present we know that Janessa kept {good_cards} cards - {dexter_given} cards = <<{good_cards}-{dexter_given}={kept_cards}>>{kept_cards} cards for herself.
